examples: The sack is too heavy to lift—you’ll have to drag it.
El saco es demasiado pesado para levantarlo, tendrás que arrastrarlo.
I dragged the chair over to the window.
Arrastré la silla hasta la ventana.
They dragged her from her bed.
La sacaron de la cama a rastras.
He quickly dragged a comb through his hair.
Rápidamente se pasó un peine por el cabello.
